mapper.select: SELECT username, phone FROM member WHERE userId=#{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userDetail (userdetailNo, userId, jobopenNo, eName, birth, zipCode, address, addressDetail, phoneNum, veteran, disable, interest) VALUES ( userdetail_seq.nextval, #{userId} ,#{jobopenNo} ,#{eName} ,#{birth} ,#{zipCode} ,#{address} ,#{addressDetail} ,#{phoneNum} ,#{veteran} ,#{disable} ,#{interest})

INSERT INTO military (militaryNo, userId, jobopenNo, discharge, startDate, endDate, mCategory, mGrade) VALUES (military_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{jobopenNo}, #{discharge}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{mCategory}, #{mGrade})
